comment: The naive version of the definition of reflexive relation ` ( A. x e. dom R x R x /\ Rel R ) ` is redundant with respect to reflexive relation (see ~ dfrefrel3 ) in equivalence relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Oct-2022.)
